section.heading: Congressional consent conditioned on nonuse of Compact to break a lawful strike.
section.text: The consent and approval of Congress set forth in § 9-1103.01 is given on the express condition that § 13(a) of Article XI and § 3(d) of Article XII of such Compact shall not be used to break a lawful strike by the employees of any carrier authorized to provide service pursuant to such Compact.

annotations.annotation: This section was enacted prior to revision of the Compact. References to specific sections of the Compact have been updated following revision of the Compact.
